content: the hug you shawl is big fluffy and warm just like a hug should be the hug you shawl is my first own design in tunisian crochet and is perfect for those who are beginners in this technique or someone who wants relaxing crochet in front of the fire place or tv i have used the yarn scheepjes whirligig 20% alpaca 80% virgin wool 450 g / 1000 m in the color 203 teal to yellow and a tunisian crochet hook 7 0 mm with a 60 cm cord for this shawl ❀ ❀ ❀ **stitches used in this pattern ** slip_stitch chain tunisian full stitch tunisian simple stitch tunisian top stitch us terms ❀ ❀ ❀ **join my facebook group ** my facebook group mijo crochet hangout is a social group where you can get support and be inspired by other fellow crocheters welcome https //www facebook com/groups/mijocrochethangout/ ❀ ❀ ❀ this pattern have been fully tested thank you sandra lindahl for your great work and feedback with this pattern ❀ ❀ ❀
